title: COVID-19 Outbreak Improves Attractiveness of Careers in Medicine in China: A Cross-Sectional Survey in High School Students and Parents
abstract: Background: The shortage of healthcare workers is becoming a serious global problem The underlying reasons may be specific to the healthcare system in each co
authors: Zhang, Ruoxin Pei Jianfeng Wang Yanli Wang Lei Yeerjiang Yeerzhati Gao Haifeng Xu Wanghong
